about_details1: Tech Analytica Limited is one of the most promising IT Services providers in Bangladesh dedicated to delivering complete IT solutions to its clients, whether they are start-up operations or large corporations. Our receptive approach makes us understand the stipulation in business and gives us the work force in meeting the necessity to accomplishing the goal.
about_details2: In addition to having our head office in Bangladesh, we also have our sales office in Canada and ascending toward becoming a paramount business house both locally and internationally. Reliability is our trademark and business relationship are our strength. The company’s high level of productivity and performance is supported by a group of motivated staff and demand structured hardware setup.
about_details3: To Tech Analytica Limited, sky is not the limit, thus we continually welcome new opportunities to fulfil the increasing demand in the IT industry worldwide.
our_vision_details: To be an organization that continually delights the customers and all stakeholders by providing the most advantageous IT services and solutions with a constant eye on innovation and by such becoming the optimum choice to the customers and clients locally as well as internationally.

ServicesAllData.name: Software Development
ServicesAllData.description: Number 1 Contrary to popular belief, Lorem Ipsum is not simply random text. It has roots in a piece of classical Latin literature from 45 BC, making it over 2000 years old. Richard McClintock, a Latin professor at Hampden-Sydney College in Virginia, looked up one of the more obscure Latin words, consectetur, from a Lorem Ipsum passage, and going through the cites of the word in classical literature, discovered the undoubtable source. Lorem Ipsum comes from sections 1.10.32 and 1.10.33 of de Finibus Bonorum et Malorum (The Extremes of Good and Evil) by Cicero, written in 45 BC. This book is a treatise on the theory of ethics, very popular during the Renaissance. The first line of Lorem Ipsum, Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, comes from a line in section 1.10.32.

privacy_protection_details: At Tech Analytica, we are fully committed to the ethical practice of intellectual property protection, and ensure to protect the assets of our clients through strict company policy and intellectual property protection acts including:
privacy_protection_key1: Execution of a comprehensive non-disclosure agreement
privacy_protection_key2: Signing of non-disclosure agreement on patent of intellectual property
privacy_protection_key3: Agreement to any ownership waiver agreements
privacy_protection_key4: Constant monitoring of employee activities in line with company policy
location_details: Progress Tower, 4th floor, House #01, Road #23, Gulshan 1, Dhaka 1212
